alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 6:58AM MST until February 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Patchy blowing dust is possible. * WHERE...Southern portions of Hidalgo county in the New Mexico Bootheel. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will be east of elevated terrain and along ridgelines. Winds will gradually subside Tuesday evening. Wildfire conditions are elevated, be careful with outdoor flames and sparks.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. If you encounter thick blowing dust while driving, pull off the road and wait for visibility to improve. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
